One of the best hentai incest artists and storytellers out there but Hyji is wasted on this mundane stuff.  Where's the taboo intimacy and draw?  I like the shock and tension of the forbidden desires, especially when paired with their illustration quality and style.  This is just bland when compared to the extremes of their previous work and leaves me wanting more.  Anything more really.

Still can’t get my head around why on Earth hyji  waited 3 entries to introduce the NTR. What was the purpose of 3 entire installments of wholesome Noboru & Miki content to just cut it off so abruptly like that. Not that I dislike the direction the story is going, but it just feels like so much time was wasted with 3 whole installments of Noboru x Miki when instead the NTR could’ve been the end of last chapter for example and this one would’ve been an entire chapter for Noboru & his mom. I feel like the story took so long to have any developments that at this point it just feels out of place
